description: Kikyou is http://anidb.net/ch2189 [Lisianthus]` second personality. She is actually her twin sister, who died while still in her mother`s womb. Sia decided to save Kikyou by allowing Kikyou`s soul to reside inside of her own. Kikyou emerges (takes control of Sia`s body) when Sia is depressed or when she feels that Sia should be more aggressive to Rin.
name: Kikyou
